snippet: Todd Akin, a member of the House who is running for Senate from Missouri, lost the support of many fellow Republicans after he made comments about abortion and “legitimate rape.”
abstract: Missouri Republican Rep Todd Akin, who is running for Senate, is regaining some of the support he lost after his controversial comments about rape and abortion.
lead_paragraph: Todd Akin, a member of the House who is running for Senate from Missouri, lost the support of many fellow Republicans after he made comments about abortion and “legitimate rape.”

headline.seo: Some in G.O.P. See Little Choice but to Back Todd Akin
headline.main: Some in G.O.P. Choose to Return to Akin’s Corner
headline.print_headline: Some in G.O.P. Choose to Return to Shunned Senate Hopeful’s Corner
